Reviews.Title: Very Happy So Far
Reviews.Author: MSG No Fear
Reviews.Content: I've noticed only minor glitches with the unit, but overall it works very well. I may have to push a button more than once to get the response, but it hasn't failed yet. Pretty happy with this unit so far. I've only used it for 30-60 days so far.

Reviews.Title: works great but ive had better UPDATE 05/2013
Reviews.Author: Stephen Lucas "bass head!"
Reviews.Content: i previously had a autopage remote start, i needed a security and remote start system though and those are not cheap. i did some research and seen that avital and pyhton were the same company and had good reviews. now it does all the functions its suppose too and i had it installed by a proffesional. CONS on this unit is the range and the crank timer had to be reset twice. overall its nice but i depend on mine alot so im going back to autopage and viper.UPDATE:BRAIN ON STARTER STOP WORKING ALARM STILL WORKS FINE BUT THE REMOTE START DOES NOT.its only been 5 months!! im highly disappointed in this product and will not buy again.back to AUTOPAGE.

Reviews.Title: Superb remote start/alarm
Reviews.Author: BrandonU
Reviews.Content: I purchased this a couple years ago from another retailer (sorry Amazon) for our '99 Suburban 2500.  I loved it so much I purchased it's twin AVITAL 5303L Security/Remote Start System for our Yukon XL.  Fairly easy to install if you are familiar with automotive alarms and remote starts, but if you are new to this, I'd suggest finding an installer.  Tons of useful features on this unit. 2-way communications means the vehicle will signal your remote when your vehicle is tampered with.  Will also show on your remote the vehicle current status, including if your doors are locked, and can even show you the temp inside the vehicle.  Remote can also be used as an alarm clock.  Great range (will work from across a parking lot easily).It even has a sensor that can be programmed to automatically turn on your defroster during remote start when it is cold out.

Reviews.Title: Remote and alarm system
Reviews.Author: Muad Nagi
Reviews.Content: Great product the only thing is it doesnt remote start from very long distance. But its worth it if you hate warming up ur car

Reviews.Title: Works and does the job
Reviews.Author: bernard caldwell
Reviews.Content: Its a good alarm. Remote start is very helpful to warm up car. I would recommend having it installed by professional. You can find a install guy on Craig's list like I did for about a 100$ .

Reviews.Title: Son loves it!
Reviews.Author: Mary M. Sassara "Mary"
Reviews.Content: Great price, great system, make sure you now how to unlock it so you don't set off alarm...my son loves it, starts car from a long ways away, 98 Subaru....I want one now...

Reviews.Title: Range is terrible
Reviews.Author: Jacob Hanson
Reviews.Content: You have to be within 75 ft. for the remote start to work. I bought this for my wife so she didn't have to get into a sub zero vehicle after work. Well, she has to park in the first row at work so that the car will start, and sometimes there are no spots available that close.  Also, the two-way feature sometimes doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: fun
Reviews.Author: rodney
Reviews.Content: product arrived quicklyhad my audio guys install it and it works great.a lot of things to figure out, but had fun doing sogreat product

Reviews.Title: Great Alarm
Reviews.Author: Wirez
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and as described. Installed on two different vehicles with no issues. Love the 2-way feature. Always know the status of the vehicle if concerned. No need to guess if the doors are locked or not. Also great range on the unit. Able to start vehicle over 20+ feet away from my basement!

ProductInfo.Features:
LCD 2-way security system with remote start
Includes 4-button remote
Remote Start Security System with Keyless Entry
Includes one LCD remote and 1 4-button remote
Multi-level security arming allows you to select which of the inputs or sensors will be active and which will be bypassed
ProductInfo.Name: Python 5303P 2-Way LCD Security System with Remote Start
